sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Squadron Mortars battle drill rehearsals (of react to contact and break contact) on 17 AUG 2023 IVO RZ D IOT refine Platoon SOPs prior to Saber Junction ’23.
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to maintain the momentum after Platoon STX by refining elements of RTC and Break Contact IOT increase the platoon and section survivability during Saber Junction ‘23
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct PCC/PCIs of NVGs, M4, and M240 React to Contact
Break Contact
Actions on Objective
sections.END STATE:
friendly forces retain combat power for follow on operations; platoon refined SOPs for contact with enemies behind the FLOT and platoon is ready to conduct operations for Saber Junction ‘23
Training Objectives
Conduct hasty TLPs and issue FRAGOs
Conduct the maneuver of a Platoon
React to direct fire contact while dismounted
Day and Night MFP Recon
Day and Night MFP Occupation
